response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is valued at $15,000 by us. Considering its worth to you, we propose a fair price of $13,500. This offer allows you to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate, maximizing your investment while benefiting from our product's superior features. We look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.", "product_price": 13500}
